library(tidyverse)

# Question 1:

```{r}
data("early_january_weather")

names(early_january_weather) # var names
nrow(early_january_weather) # number of rows
ncol(early_january_weather) # number of cols
mean(early_january_weather$temp) # mean temp
```

The `early_january_weather` dataset contains variables about the date and time, temperature, dew point, humidity, wind information, precipitation, pressure, and visibility metrics.
